resources.string: Sebastian Vettel (born 3 July 1987) is a German racing driver who competes in Formula One for Aston Martin, having previously driven for BMW Sauber, Toro Rosso, Red Bull and Ferrari. Vettel has won four World Drivers\' Championship titles which he won consecutively from 2010 to 2013. He currently holds the record for Formula One\'s youngest World Champion.
